title: 我需要显示生命指令
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content: 我需要显示生命指令,右侧计分板，版本1.12.2

replies.author: Belanga
replies.txt_content:
先
/scoreboard objectives add 计分板 health 显示名复制代码
再
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar 计分板名复制代码
scoreboard objectives add 计分板 health 显示名复制代码
scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar 计分板复制代码
